description: In this overview Cherokee introduces Dr. Terra Vanzant Stern. Dr.Stern explains how she has developed this curriculum to share years of successful experience to help improve your professional growth. Self-management, interviewing skills, lean meetings, lean strategic planning, lean negotiations and what to expect within the first 45 days of employment are introduced as episode topics.
descriptionMD: In this overview Cherokee introduces Dr. Terra Vanzant Stern. Dr.Stern explains how she has developed this curriculum to share years of successful experience to help improve your professional growth. Self-management, interviewing skills, lean meetings, lean strategic planning, lean negotiations and what to expect within the first 45 days of employment are introduced as episode topics.
name: Professional Growth

episodes.description: In this overview Cherokee introduces Dr. Terra Vanzant Stern. Dr.Stern explains how she has developed this curriculum to share years of successful experience to help improve your professional growth. Self-management, interviewing skills, lean meetings, lean strategic planning, lean negotiations and what to expect within the first 45 days of employment are introduced as episode topics.
episodes.title: Overview

episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Dr. Terra Vanzant Stern discuss self-management. Dr. Stern begins by putting things such as time and money into perspective. Next, she explains how to leverage industry tools such as a WBS Work Breakdown Structure and tailor them for personal use to implement in a self-management plan.
episodes.title: Self Management

episodes.description: In this show, the ladies continue to discuss self-management. Tools like Force Field Analysis and Not-to-Do-List to help maintain focus on things within our control so time is not wanted with factors outside of our control. In addition, Dr. Stern explains how important it is to establish and adhere to your core values.
episodes.title: Self Management Part 2

episodes.description: In this episode, Dr.Stern and Cherokee begin discussing ways one should approach an interview. First, Dr. Stern explains how different strategies should be used depending on what stage of the interview process you are in. They discuss what to expect during the screening phase.
episodes.title: Interviewing

episodes.description: In this episode, the ladies continue discussing ways one should approach an interview. In this show they look at the Next Level interview. Dr. Stern gives several tips and techniques to help you once you have been through the screening process.
episodes.title: Interviewing Part 2

episodes.description: In this episode, the ladies continue discussing ways one should approach an interview. In this show they look at the team interviews. Dr. Stern gives several tips and techniques to help you gain enough confidence and control to get have a successful outcome under pressure.
episodes.title: Interviewing Part 3

episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Dr. Terra Vanzant Stern talk about how we can apply lean methodology to make meetings better, faster, and more cost effective. With the average person spending more than 9,000 hours in meetings this show is geared to help that time become more productive.
episodes.title: Lean Meetings

episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Dr. Terra Vanzant Stern talk about how to apply lean methodology to improve strategic planning making processes better, faster, and more cost effective.
episodes.title: Lean Strategic Planning

episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Dr. Terra Vanzant Stern discuss taking the next step. The first 45 days after being hired are essential for setting the stage. The ladies cover some things that one should or even should not do.
episodes.title: Your First 45 Days

episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Dr. Terra Vanzant Stern continue to discuss the first 45 days of employment. Dr. Stern covers different conduct behaviors and ways to respond and interact with these behaviors.
episodes.title: Your First 45 Days Part 2

episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Dr. Terra Vanzant Stern continue to discuss the first 45 days of employment. Dr. Stern expounds on different conduct behaviors and ways to respond and interact with these behaviors. The ladies look at backstabbing, needy, know it all and critical conduct.
episodes.title: Your First 45 Days Part 3

episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Dr. Terra Vanzant Stern introduce Lean Negotiations. Dr Stern explains how she was forced into negotiation situations and what she has learned from her experiences. She offers serval suggestions to help provide a true win-win proposition.
episodes.title: Lean Negotiations

episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Dr. Terra Vanzant Stern continue discussing negotiations by leveraging Leaner Six Sigma tools and methods to prepare, stay focused and deal with different personalities.
episodes.title: Lean Negotiations Part 2
